Fenris' Pelt

armor (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 241
armor id [armor]: 72 (Fenris' Pelt)
protection, body [protbody]: 16
encumbrance [enc]: 1
resist cold [coldres]: +5
start battle spell [startbattlespell]: #792 Howl
swiftness [swiftness]: 50
(mountain-survival [mount], gone-berserk [bers])

Requires 25N to forge (N4)

This pelt is the flayed skin of the Father of All Wolves. It is coal-black, shaggy and huge. The pelt will imbue the wearer with the strength, speed, and rage of the Father of Wolves. Wolves will also come to his side in times of need and serve him as if he were their patriarch.
